title: How to Curl Your Hair with the Instyler

steps.headline: Set the temperature to a comfortable heat level
Slowly drive the in styler to the roots of the hair.
Turn the cylinder up keeping the cylinder rotating for 3-5 sec

text: Power on the in-styler  Set the temperature to a comfortable heat level  Gather "2-3" area of the hair  Direct the cylinder side upwards  Slowly drive the in styler to the roots of the hair.  Turn the cylinder up keeping the cylinder rotating for 3-5 sec
